name: International Conference on Sustainable Built Environment
content: The Department of Architecture & Planning, IIT Roorkee is organising International Conference on “Sustainable Built Environment” (SBE-17) from 3rd to 5th February 2017\. Themes of SBE​-​2017 are focused towards bringing a connect between the fundamental principles of architecture and planning, cultural values and future technologies. The Themes for the conference are : Theme 1: Architecture & Sustainability Theme 2: Planning for Resilience Theme 3: Art, Craft & Heritage Theme 4: Community Development & Urban Design
